page.title: 12CRUCKMEOLE FARM YEAR
page.content:
90% of the farmers time is taken up looking after the dairyherd.
January ___ Pruning fruit. February __ Spraying the fruit. March _____ Working the ground down. April _____ Sowing and fertilising May _______ Reduce dairy work and begin silage, straw strawberries. June ______ Cuts grass for silage clamp. Tends the soft fruit. July ______ Starts selling the soft fruit, calving. August ____ Corn harvesting, ploughing and re-seeding the grass, calving. September _ Sowing winter barley. October ___ Calving, sorting potatoes. November __ " " December __ Ploughing, sowing potatoes.
